item.title: 19 世纪一场针对黑人企业和一体化市政厅的暴力政变的故事在很大程度上被遗忘，但现在历史学家们正在努力纪念这些受害者。
item.description:
The story of a violent 19th-century coup against Black businesses and an integrated city hall was largely left untold — but now historians are working to honor those victims. https://t.co/ARPEFIrSna

— ABC News (@ABC) March 25, 2024

item.title: 在被曼哈顿大陪审团起诉后，前总统特朗普面临 34 项伪造商业记录的重罪指控。以下是此案的时间线，可追溯到特朗普最初宣布竞选总统时：

Former Pres. Trump is facing 34 felony counts of falsifying business records after being indicted by a Manhattan grand jury.

item.title: 成千上万的印度教信徒涌入寺庙，庆祝印度的色彩节 Holi。Holi 标志着印度、尼泊尔和其他南亚国家以及散居地春季的到来。
item.description:
Thousands of Hindu devotees flocked to temples to celebrate Holi, the Indian festival of colors.

Holi marks the arrival of the spring season in India, Nepal and other South Asian countries as well as the diaspora. https://t.co/lmTgRVxtDu pic.twitter.com/A8KMGWRxnp

— ABC News (@ABC) March 25, 2024

item.title: 塔雷娅-约翰逊（Tareasa Johnson）在 TikTok 上发布的帖子引起了热议，这些帖子记录了她与一个男人结婚时的挣扎，她声称这个男人是个病态的骗子。
item.description:
Tareasa Johnson went viral over her TikTok posts chronicling her struggle of marrying a man who she claims turned out to be a pathological liar.

"Impact x @Nightline" takes a look at Johnson's story and the accounts of victims who said they were tricked. https://t.co/ZVKO33h08Q

item.title: 欧盟一项旨在应对气候变化和更好地保护自然的计划被无限期推迟，这凸显了席卷欧洲大陆的农民抗议活动在 6 月欧盟议会选举前对政治的影响。
item.description:

item.title: 英国一家野生动物园的黑熊围栏里出现了一大片积水，饲养员给它们留下了天鹅脚踏船，让它们尽情玩耍。
item.description:
When wet weather left a large pool of water in the black bear enclosure at a British safari park, keepers left them a swan pedalo to keep them entertained.

The intrigued animals wasted no time clambering aboard their new neighbor to investigate. https://t.co/H26TVoE7xI pic.twitter.com/7LK0KRc0HX

— ABC News (@ABC) March 25, 2024

item.title: 快餐连锁店 Chick-Fil-A 违背了其十年之久的 "绝不使用抗生素 "承诺，该承诺旨在帮助防止人类因畜牧生产中大量使用抗生素而产生抗药性：
item.description:
The fast-food chain Chick-Fil-A backtracked from its decade-old “no antibiotics ever” pledge intended to help prevent human antibiotic resistance linked to the rampant use of the drugs in livestock production.

item.title: 周一，俄罗斯在五天内第三次向基辅发射导弹，这是克里姆林宫军队对乌克兰城市的空中轰炸明显升级的一部分，战争已进入第三年，前线基本处于静止状态。
item.description:
